required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Predict Efficacy by Detecting Circulating Endothelial Cell Subsets and Blood Perfusion Parameters Changes in Vivo Tumor in Study of QL1101 and Avastin® in Patients With Non-squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: To Predict Efficacy by Detecting Circulating Endothelial Cell Subsets and Blood Perfusion Parameters Changes in Vivo Tumor in Study of QL1101 and Avastin® in Patients With Non-squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

collaborator.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To reveal changes of peripheral markers and blood perfusion parameters in vivo tumor in the study of QL1101 and Avastin® in patients with Non-squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

detailed_description.textblock: The study is QL1101-002 additional research, by detecting the blood circulating endothelial cells and blood perfusion parameters change within tumors early prediction efficacy and drug resistance.

primary_outcome.description: The actual endpoint is best response seen during the study

primary_outcome.measure: Number of circulating endothelial cell subsets
primary_outcome.time_frame: different time points before and after one week of treatment of QL1101 or avastin, an expected average of 2 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To detect the number of circulating activated endothelial cell (aCECs) by flow cytometry

secondary_outcome.measure: The strength of intratumoral blood perfusion index(BV,BF,PS and MTT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: different time points before and after 3 weeks of treatment QL1101 or avastin, an expected average of 6 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: To detect the strength of intratumoral blood perfusion index(BV,BF,PS and MTT) by CT perfusion imaging
DOR is defined as the time from the first tumor evaluation as CR or PR to the first evaluation as PD or death
Assessment following therapy with either QL1101 or avastin

arm_group.description: QL1101 + paclitaxel/carboplatin:subjects are given 15 mg/kg QL1101 on Day 1 of each cycle with every 3 weeks as a cycle, respectively combined with paclitaxel/carboplatin for 6 cycles.
Avastin® + paclitaxel/carboplatin:subjects are given 15 mg/kg Avastin® on Day 1 of each cycle with every 3 weeks as a cycle, respectively combined with paclitaxel/carboplatin for 6 cycles.

intervention.description: targeted vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) monoclonal antibodies
targeted vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) monoclonal antibodies
175 mg/m2, IV following investigational product on day 1 of each 21 day cycle.
AUC 5 IV, following paclitaxel on day 1 of each 21 day cycle.

study_pop.textblock: The patients with Non-squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer,who should meet the eligibility criteria.Because the study is QL1101-002 additional research, all people meet QL1101-002 clinical research requirements

facility.name: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.keyword: QL1101 Avastin® Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
